text: Jacksons Food Stores Industry Convenience stores Founded 1975 Founder John D. Jackson Headquarters Meridian, Idaho, U.S. Number of locations 300 Key people Cory Jackson Products Snacks, candy, beverages, beer, spirits, fuel Jacksons Food Stores is a chain of gas stations and stores. There are 300 stores in the states of Washington, Oregon, Idaho, California, Nevada, Utah, and Arizona. == References == Category:1975 establishments in the United States Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:Companies based in Idaho
title: Jacksons Food Stores
